query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Indonesian | Lemma | English | Italian | Arabic | Sanskrit | |---|---|---|---|---|---| | Di | di | | | | | | tengah | tengah | | | | | | perjalanan | perjalanan | | | | | | hidup | hidup | | | | | | kami | kami | | | | | | aku | aku | | | | | | menemukan | temu | | | | | | diri | diri | | | | | | ku | ku | | | | | | di | di | | | | | | hutan | hutan | | | | | | yang | yang | | | | | | gelap | gelap | | | | | | karena | karena | | | | | | jalan | jalan | | | | | | yang | yang | | | | | | benar | benar | | | | | | telah | telah | | | | | | hilang | hilang | | | | |
